programme.desc: A look at the career of Innes Lloyd, one of the UKs most prolific producers of television drama, who made well over 300 individual drama programmes between 1966 and 1991.

programme.title: Michael Palin Remembers... East of Ipswich
programme.desc: Michael Palin recounts the story behind his much-loved 1987 coming-of-age drama East of Ipswich.

programme.title: East of Ipswich
programme.desc: A pair of vacationing teenagers turn the sleepy English town of Southwold into their private playground.

programme.title: Jessye Norman at the BBC
programme.desc: A superb compilation celebrating the artistry of one of the great sopranos of the 20th century, Jessye Norman, tracing her remarkable journey from spirituals and traditional folk songs to her landmark debut at the London Proms. Featuring interviews with the star across the decades, this programme showcases the extraordinary breadth of her repertoire, from American Songbook favourites to the grandeur of Mahlers song cycles.

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: The Top of the Pops Christmas Day special from 1992. Mark Franklin and Tony Dortie, together with their special guests, Sid Owen and Danniella Westbrook, review the years chart hits, including performances by Wet Wet Wet, Right Said Fred, Shut Up and Dance ft Peter Bouncer, KWS, Jimmy Nail, Mariah Carey, Undercover and Tasmin Archer.

programme.title: The Smeds and the Smoos
programme.desc: Two young aliens from warring families fall in love and run away, leading their relatives on a chase across outer space. Animated adaptation of the childrens book by Julia Donaldson and Axel Scheffler.

programme.title: The Highway Rat
programme.desc: A greedy rat tyrannises animals along the highway and steals their food at every opportunity. However, what the rat really wants are cakes and anything sugary, and its his sweet tooth that could finally lead him to a sticky outcome.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: Ben, Kate and the keepers are pulling out all the stops to deliver festive treats in time for the big day. The whole park is mobilised for one of the biggest animal enrichments on record. The keepers have arranged for tons of sand to be delivered to the safari drive-through for the zebras, giraffe and ostrich to play in. The keepers anticipate theyll love rolling in their treat, but as is so often the case with toys at Christmas, should they have kept the receipt?

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A very special 20th birthday episode! Martin is joined by Changing Rooms legend Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen to look around a three-bedroom terrace just outside Bristol, and of course Laurence falls in love with the avocado bathroom suite! We delve into the archives going all the way back to 2005, where Martin saw a disused former public toilet that was up for sale at auction. Jacqui is in Essex to see a three-bed semi thats crumbling from the outside and letting the street down.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Charlie Ross presents todays show from an antiques and collectors fair in Shepton Mallet, Somerset. Helped by experts Kate Bliss and Colin Young, the teams hunt for bargains to sell at auction. Meanwhile, can anyone guess Charlies mystery item, which played a big part in local industry?

Each celebrity must prepare a three-course meal.

programme.desc: Dame Mary Berry celebrates the magic of the seasons traditions. Along with her special guests - legendary actor Alison Steadman, Commonwealth sprinter and star of Gladiators Harry Aikines-Aryeetey and much-loved broadcaster and presenter Zoe Ball. And central to it all are Marys exceptional recipes, including pigs in blankets cassoulet, roast king mushrooms with chestnut stuffing, a magnificent cherry and lemon mille-feuille and a show-stopping grand finale of pear and ginger steamed pudding.

programme.title: Hunting Britains Parcel Thieves

programme.title: Handmade: Britains Best Woodworker
programme.desc: The woodworkers race against time to make a handcrafted clock and a bunch of realistic roses from delicate pieces of planed wood. But whose time is finally up?

programme.title: Hollyoaks: Omnibus

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The gang at Cheers calls in a ringer to help the pub win a bowling match against a rival bar.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Cliffs long-lost father visits.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Lou Ferrigno, the actor who played `The Incredible Hulk in the 1980s, moves in next door. Arthur vows to get him to read his script.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug and Carrie are trying for a baby, but are disrupted in their efforts when Dougs parents come to stay.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: When Raymond lies and tells Debra that hes already bought her an incredibly thoughtful Christmas present, he frantically tries to figure out what to get her.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: The kids ruin Rays dictionary.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier plans a major Christmas blowout, Daphne comes to grips with some surprising information, and Niles new relationship hits a snag.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A scheming Frasier finally works his way into hosting the annual televised Christmas parade but is horrified to learn that his wildly successful protege - the sassy, brassy radio host Dr Mary - will be his co-host, prompting a battle royal for control of the microphone.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier and Niles squabble over who will host Christmas festivities, and Roz develops a crush on Santa Claus.

programme.title: A Baby Reindeers First Christmas
programme.desc: Documentary following a community of herders in the Scottish Highlands preparing young reindeer for their first Christmas, and an orphaned reindeer calf who battles against the odds.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Taz and Mark want a holiday home on the stunning western Costa del Sol. Fond of Casares and La Duquesa, can Leah Charles-King find them their perfect place for £250k?

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at The Bickford Arms in Holsworthy in Devon, where self-confessed rookie Keith hopes that his hard work and charisma can win over his more experienced rivals.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Abby Norton hosts at Newchester Farmhouse BandB in Merriott in Somerset. The superstar beds and lacklustre linen receive mixed reactions, but all the guests are wowed by Abbys hospitality.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Collette and Danny hope to impress their rivals at The Quay Inn in Minehead in Somerset. However, cleanliness issues, a damaged bath panel and sausage squabbles might scupper their chances.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Justin and Mike host the final visit, at Old Walls Vineyard Luxury Lodges in Bishopsteignton in Devon. The stunning location captivates Abby, but breakfast leaves Danny egg-specting more.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandBers meet for the last time to settle some scores. After a week featuring wi-fi woes and a battle of the bangers, the payments are revealed and the winner is announced.

programme.title: Kirsties Handmade Christmas
programme.desc: Four talented paper crafters cut and fold their way to glory in Kirsties paper craft competition. From interactive garlands and a light-up box to a matchbox make and a ride-on sleigh, there really is something for everyone.

programme.title: Castle Howard: A Very British Christmas
programme.desc: Two of Britains top designers spend all of 2025 transforming Yorkshires spectacular Castle Howard into a festive Wizard of Oz extravaganza for a very special Christmas.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jean Johansson helps Andrea and Gary find their dream holiday home on the Caribbean Island of St Lucia. What gems will they find for their £205k and will any be the perfect one?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Luna the labradoodle needs a Christmas miracle to get past her fear of strangers. American Bulldog Chico seeks love under the mistletoe. And can Jenny the terrier melt Ricks frosty heart?

programme.title: A Very British Christmas
programme.desc: Two of Britains top designers take on a brief fit for a queen this Christmas at Kensington Palace. Theyve been commissioned to create an installation that marks 190 years since Princess Victoria spent Christmas in the seaside town of Ramsgate.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: This unforgettable night of festive dating includes an Essex barber bearing a flirty gift, a rusty furniture maker, a maths genius, a doctor, and some former Daters with exciting news.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: Bill Bailey Tinselworm
programme.desc: Filmed at Wembley Arena at the end of his UK sell-out tour, the show includes Bill Baileys trademark musical inventiveness and verbal brilliance as well as films and animation by award-winning film-maker Joe Magee.

programme.title: Brassed Off
programme.desc: In an English village, almost everyone is dependent on the local coal mine and the government have sent a group to evaluate if the mine should be closed or not. The only thing that keeps the workers spirits up is the brass band and when the pit is closed, they decide to enter into a national competition.

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker round up and examine the weeks leading and most entertaining news stories via their acerbic wit, discussions and sketches. And each week, guests join them to dissect the weeks events and talking points.

programme.title: Kevin Bridges: The Story Continues
programme.desc: Kevin returns to the SECC to perform a record-breaking run of ten sold out nights to over 75,000 ecstatic fans. Recorded on a Saturday night in Glasgow, Kevin is in his element, as this home town gig shows off his no-nonsense approach to comedy.

programme.title: Comedy Central Presents
programme.desc: Comic Ardal OHanlon discusses various, topics including how he really feels about his native Ireland.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party, Monica hires a stripper to perform for him, without learning that shes a prostitute. Elsewhere, Rachels father learns about her pregnancy and plans to give Ross a piece of his mind.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to a swimming pool but finds himself terrified of the high diving board; afterwards, he must try several imaginative ways to get out of the car park when he doesnt have enough money to pay. He then demonstrates the proper way to make a sandwich whilst out at the park. Finally, when Mr Bean and his girlfriend go on a date to watch a horror movie he teases her for being scared, until the film actually starts.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a portable television but cant get it to work properly. Then, when his camera is stolen, he must identify the suspect in a police line up. Afterwards, he attends a magic show and disco with his girlfriend but ends up embarrassing her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross Step Forward
programme.desc: Ross new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards, Rachel eyes Joey as a possible romantic partner, and the newlyweds cope with Chandlers boss as he goes through a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Dirty Girl
programme.desc: Phoebe and Monica decide to go into business together after they cater a funeral where the widow tries not to pay, and Ross date with the beautiful Cheryl goes awry when he kills a rat in her filthy apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes half-brother makes an astounding announcement and a thought-provoking request, while Joey finds himself in a class struggle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Rugby
programme.desc: Ross takes up rugby to impress Emily, and Chandler sets up a ruse to avoid his former girlfriend Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Worst Best Man Ever
programme.desc: Chandler and Joey vie for the position of best man for Ross wedding ceremony. Ross chooses Joey after Chandler inadvertently insults Ross, but Joey loses Ross treasured wedding ring. Elsewhere, Phoebe suffers extreme mood swings because of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel, Monica, Joey, Chandler and Ross go to London for the wedding where Joey meets Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Rachel frantically tries to get to London to tell Ross that she loves him before he marries Emily. Meanwhile, Rosss mother, Judy, and father, Jack, argue with Emilys parents, Steven and Andrea Waltham.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Ross Says Rachel
programme.desc: Ross has married Emily, but during the reception she punches him and flees. Meanwhile, new lovers Monica and Chandler are finding it hard to keep their agreement.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
programme.desc: Joey challenges Phoebe to perform a completely selfless act, Monica gets upset when Chandler gloats about sex, and Ross has a chance to get back together with Emily - but first he must make a tough decision.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: With performances from soul sensation Seal and comedy virtuoso Bill Bailey, as well as new stand-up material from Michael himself. programme.title: Comedy Central Presents
programme.desc: Comic Ardal OHanlon discusses various, topics including how he really feels about his native Ireland.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party, Monica hires a stripper to perform for him, without learning that shes a prostitute. Elsewhere, Rachels father learns about her pregnancy and plans to give Ross a piece of his mind.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to a swimming pool but finds himself terrified of the high diving board; afterwards, he must try several imaginative ways to get out of the car park when he doesnt have enough money to pay. He then demonstrates the proper way to make a sandwich whilst out at the park. Finally, when Mr Bean and his girlfriend go on a date to watch a horror movie he teases her for being scared, until the film actually starts.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a portable television but cant get it to work properly. Then, when his camera is stolen, he must identify the suspect in a police line up. Afterwards, he attends a magic show and disco with his girlfriend but ends up embarrassing her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross Step Forward
programme.desc: Ross new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards, Rachel eyes Joey as a possible romantic partner, and the newlyweds cope with Chandlers boss as he goes through a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Dirty Girl
programme.desc: Phoebe and Monica decide to go into business together after they cater a funeral where the widow tries not to pay, and Ross date with the beautiful Cheryl goes awry when he kills a rat in her filthy apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes half-brother makes an astounding announcement and a thought-provoking request, while Joey finds himself in a class struggle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Rugby
programme.desc: Ross takes up rugby to impress Emily, and Chandler sets up a ruse to avoid his former girlfriend Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Worst Best Man Ever
programme.desc: Chandler and Joey vie for the position of best man for Ross wedding ceremony. Ross chooses Joey after Chandler inadvertently insults Ross, but Joey loses Ross treasured wedding ring. Elsewhere, Phoebe suffers extreme mood swings because of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel, Monica, Joey, Chandler and Ross go to London for the wedding where Joey meets Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Rachel frantically tries to get to London to tell Ross that she loves him before he marries Emily. Meanwhile, Rosss mother, Judy, and father, Jack, argue with Emilys parents, Steven and Andrea Waltham.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Ross Says Rachel

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
programme.desc: Joey challenges Phoebe to perform a completely selfless act, Monica gets upset when Chandler gloats about sex, and Ross has a chance to get back together with Emily - but first he must make a tough decision.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.desc: As canneries unexpectedly change delivery rules, captains must race to get to the front of the line. Jake risks a daring entry into St. Paul harbour, as Johnathan seeks help from Wild Bill.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: Freddy and Juan face off at a hard rock mine spanning three elevations at 4,000 feet in the Cascades; battling impenetrable rock, the guys devise an innovative 180-foot chute featuring a spiral concentrator in their first Washington state rescue.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: With nearly forty years of mining under his belt, Freddy Dodge goes on the road to help struggling mine owners to hit the mother lode. He teams up with Juan Ibarra to overhaul washplants, introduce gold recovery techniques and transform operations.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: When Freddy and Juan get an SOS from an Oregon couples mine, they must unravel an underground mystery buried beneath a dried riverbed; facing misleading dredge tailings and a faulty homemade wash plant, the guys call in all-new tech as a final hope.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: With gold prices surging to new records, the modern-day rush is on; chasing gold fever, miners take big risks on poor ground with outdated equipment; gold recovery experts Freddy Dodge and Juan Ibarra are back, turning those pitfalls into profits.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: Two rookie miners in MT desperately need to double their gold after a disastrous start to the season.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: With pressure mounting after a disastrous first Forever Claim barge and the prospect of losing Float Camp, Jared brings in more crew -- including a gamble on a new Fat Truck driver -- to boost production.

programme.desc: Josh Gates chases the lost fortune of Prohibitions infamous bootlegger Dutch Schultz. Josh dives the murky shore near Dutchs lavish New York mansion and searches the massive underground bunker that housed Dutchs secret distillery.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers are on the search for the most interesting food that Britains mums are cooking for their families this Christmas. Si and Dave tour the nation hunting out Britains festive favourites and a few surprises. On their journey they find mums cooking everything from roast goose with all the trimmings to Pinnekjott and from festive gingerbread to Christmassy coconut samosas.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers At Christmas
programme.desc: The biking duo team up to throw an epic Christmas dinner for their combined families. They take a road trip along the Pennines in search of the best produce for their feast.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers Twelve Days of Christmas
programme.desc: The Hairy Bikers journey through the verses of one of our most popular Christmas songs. For each line of the song, the boys have come up with a fantastic twist on a classic Christmas dish. From roast partridge with spiced pears (a partridge in a pear tree) and a classic trio of top end Poulets de Bresse chicken dishes (three French hens) to spiced Christmas pannacotta (eight Maids a-milking).

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers Christmas Party
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers are throwing a Christmas party for family, friends and some of the people they have met on the road over the last few years. However, this is a `hairy party so it will be anything but predictable. Its all about finger food, those tiny mouthfuls of loveliness that brighten up the festive season from the first Christmas party right through to New Years Eve.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Christmas Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater transforms Christmas leftovers into scrumptious meals which will make the prospect of festive entertaining a treat rather than a terror. He creates simple dishes from leftovers and seasonal veg, ensuring that nothing goes to waste.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Christmas has arrived at The Repair Shop, where its team of passionate and skilled craftspeople set to work repairing and rescuing four beloved festive treasures. Vicar Steve Stewart and his wife Amanda have brought their cherished rocking horse to the barn. The toy was a Christmas gift for their daughter Tamsin when she was five years old. Tragically, just two years later, their little girl passed away.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A pair of sisters bring in a family bike that travelled around the world with them. Plus, a woman brings in a leather case that belonged to her great aunt for restoration.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.sub-title: Blast Through Rock, Map Earth, Provide Flowers Year-Round
programme.desc: A look at some ordinary objects of the modern world, simple things that are the products of the most extraordinary scientific engineering processes. This episode looks at how they blast through rock, how we map the Earth, and how they provide flowers year round.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.sub-title: Work in 600-Degree Heat; Make Champagne; Expand Ports
programme.desc: How do they make the cool clothing that can withstand the heat of a blast furnace, how is sea turned into land to create an artificial island and how is the fizz put into Champagne?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.sub-title: Manufacture Propellers; Intelligent Cars; Turning Metal Into Magnets
programme.desc: Discover how a car that can call emergency services was designed, how to turn metal into magnets and how the biggest ships are propelled.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Find out how they look after sharks at the worlds biggest aquarium, how to grow precious stones and what it takes to build a luxury Bentley.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike and Ant work on one of the first utility vehicles, a 1964 Ford Falcon Ranchero, whose vintage features are suffering under a coat of cheap black paint.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike picks up an extremely distressed 1965 Dodge A-100 Sportsman. Will custom-built surf inspired details provide enough wow-factor to snag a buyer?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew finds a mysterious piece of black pottery in Lancashire, an exotic piece in a zoo in East Anglia and fiercely haggles with an old foe in a nearby salvage yard.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew is at a country house sale in Norfolk, he finds a unique tartan piece at a classic tailors in Glasgow, and his oddest buy ever in Liverpool.

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea
programme.desc: Catherine packs her sun cream and glasses and pops off to Portugal, where shes helping Jodie and mum Gene, who are desperate for their very own bolthole in the sun.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Jay Blades is rummaging through the rubbish at Walsall Recycling Centre, where he is on the lookout for three unwanted items he can save from the skip. Jay calls on designer Sarah Peterson to give a pair of chairs a modern twist, while carpenter Bruce Faulseit is tasked with repurposing a collection of metal racks and drawers. For his own project, Jay has a school desk to contend with, but will he succeed in giving all three cast-offs a new lease of life?

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Upcycling supremo Sarah Moore scours the skips at Witley Recycling Centre in Surrey, hoping to find three unwanted items she can restore, rejuvenate and sell on for a profit. Assisting Sarah in her mission are trusty artisans Neil Wragg and Simion Hawtin-Smith. A pair of leather wallets are given a magic makeover by bag maker Neil, while upholsterer Simion has the task of transforming a rocking chair. A collection of oak off-cuts will be given the upcycling once-over by Sarah.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Sarah Moore is at Woking Recycling Centre in Surrey searching for tired and unwanted items she can transform from skip-bound to stylish. With three items saved, Sarah turns to upholsterer Sharon OConnor to overhaul an old chair frame, while upcycler Jacqui Joseph attempts to transform a dated desk. Sarahs challenge is to update a set of four chairs, but will her eclectic items prove to be too past-it to make a profit?

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: At Merchants Way recycling centre in Walsall, Jay Blades is sifting through the unwanted whatnots in search of three hidden gems he can take, transform and turn a profit on. Designer Rachel Henderson has her hands full with an old fireplace, while robot-maker Mark Haig attempts to inject new life into a collection of brass lighting. Jay sees profit-making potential in a stained-glass door and window, but will he succeed in finding new homes for all his items?

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Upcycling aficionado Sarah Moore is rummaging the rubbish at Wallyford Recycling Centre in East Lothian in the hope of finding hidden gems to transform. With three items saved, Sarah turns to designer Sarah Peterson to make over a tired trolley, while upcycler Rupert Blanchard gets creative with a telephone table. For her own project, Sarah attempts to transform a nest of tables, but will she and her team succeed in turning the items from old to sold?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew and Tee take a trip to Portugal, a hidden gem of the antiques trade. They unearth some architectural marvels recovered from an 18th century church.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.sub-title: Every Day Is A School Day
programme.desc: Drew never knows what he might find, who hell meet, or what hell learn. He visits an outsider artist with a newly curated art collection.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew meets dealers who see antiques in different ways. He finds a carved lion with a mysterious back-story, and four chairs by his design hero, Pugin.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew seeks out antiques that are rich with local provenance. On the Scottish border, he finds a Georgian Cockpen chair, then snaps up a chilling art piece in North Wales.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: On a trip from Manchester to Hampshire, Drew visits expert dealers, snapping up a campaign chair, a Georgian bookcase, and a 19th-century carved deer.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A pair of sisters bring in a family bike that travelled around the world with them. Plus, a woman brings in a leather case that belonged to her great aunt for restoration.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts travel across the nation to search for hidden treasures, from household items to one-of-a kind collectibles. The experts then head to auction to battle it out and make the biggest profit from their items.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: A huge haul of designer watches sets pulses racing on auction day. Angus helps a woman sell some antiques her late father meticulously restored.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Two stories shaped by moments from British history: a family torn apart by a wartime baby and a daughter given up against a backdrop of racism. Barbara always believed that she was one of three children and in her 20s she made a startling discovery.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Featuring two women looking for answers to questions that have haunted them for decades. Firstly, a woman who made a discovery as a teenager that changed her life and secondly, a mother longing to find the son she felt she let down as a baby.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Bassa Villa has had a haunted reputation for years. During investigation, the team discover a brutal murder has taken place at this 16th century pub and inn.

programme.title: Celebrity Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Nancy DellOlio is targeted by an unknown entity in her home in Southern Italy. Who is targeting her, and do they have malevolent intentions?

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: California Dreamin: The Songs of the Mamas and the Papas
programme.desc: Performance clips, home movies and interviews with members of the group show its folk/pop foundations.

programme.title: The World In A Painting: Caravaggios Comb
programme.desc: Caravaggios Comb brings us a revised vision of history: the trade routes that brought ivory to Europe in the 16th century. In the foreground of Caravaggios Martha and Mary Magdalene lies a fine ivory comb with a broken tooth.

programme.title: The Art of Architecture
programme.sub-title: New Music School, Kings College School, Wimbledon
programme.desc: Sir Michael Hopkinss latest project is a choir school in Wimbledon, overseen by senior architect Mike Taylor, which perfectly illustrates the attention to detail and materiality the Hopkins have made their trademark.

programme.title: Riverdance 25th Anniversary Show
programme.desc: Reinvention of "Riverdance" immerses viewers into the energy and passion of Irish music and dance.

programme.title: Under Capricorn
programme.desc: Poison and passion in 18th-century Australia. A young man is shocked to find that his genteel cousin, married to a tough ex-con who has found wealth in the penal colony, has taken to the bottle. His efforts to restore her spirits turn into more tender affections, but the actions of a malevolent housekeeper spark a chain of events that climax with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: A Brass Band Winter Wonderland
programme.desc: Jason Manford introduces Stockports Fairey Band and the Hackney Colliery Band in this unique festive concert from the spectacular Peak Cavern in the Peak District.

programme.title: Shake Hands With the Devil
programme.desc: An American medical student in 1921 Dublin falls under the influence of his professor, an Irish revolutionary.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: An adulterous orchid lover cares more for his flowers than his wife. When presented with a job in America, he thinks it the ideal opportunity to get rid of her through dastardly means.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year

programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The plucky penguins join a special inter-species task force in an attempt to stop an evil doctor from taking over the world.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: A once-talented pianist rejects his promising career to live a relaxed, blue-collar life as an oil rigger. On discovering that his father is ill some years later, he reluctantly returns home, only to find that he no longer fits in with either his artistic family or his working-class friends.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A reluctant bare-knuckle boxer and his manager brother must travel across the country for one last fight, but an unexpected travel companion exposes the cracks in their bond along the way.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: A once-talented pianist rejects his promising career to live a relaxed, blue-collar life as an oil rigger. On discovering that his father is ill some years later, he reluctantly returns home, only to find that he no longer fits in with either his artistic family or his working-class friends.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A reluctant bare-knuckle boxer and his manager brother must travel across the country for one last fight, but an unexpected travel companion exposes the cracks in their bond along the way.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: Blake Edwards bittersweet tale about the seemingly air-headed elegant socialite Holly Golightly whose façade hides pain and loss, and Paul Varjak, a blocked writer with his own dark secrets who falls for her. As their Manhattan-based romance progresses, one of them will end up heartbroken.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick OConnell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: Thelma Post is a 93-year-old grandmother who loses $10,000 to a con artist on the phone. With help from a friend and his motorised scooter, she soon embarks on a treacherous journey across Los Angeles to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: In search of a fresh start, two women embark on an impromptu road trip to Tallahassee, Fla. However, things quickly go awry when they cross paths with a group of inept criminals along the way.

programme.title: Sweethearts
programme.desc: Two college freshmen make a pact to break up with their high school sweethearts over Thanksgiving break, leading them on a chaotic night out in their hometown that puts their codependent friendship to the test.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: Exploring an abandoned visitor centre, Clover and her friends encounter a masked killer who murders them one by one. However, when they mysteriously wake up at the beginning of the same night, theyre forced to relive the terror over and over again.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue artificial intelligence that can destroy mankind.

programme.title: Hallow Road
programme.desc: Two parents receive a distressing late-night call from their teenage daughter, who has just accidentally hit a pedestrian. They jump in their car, racing to get there before anyone else. Disturbing revelations threaten to tear the family apart.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organised crime forever.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.
