programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: After Will Spanns wife suddenly vanishes at a gas station, his desperate search to find her leads him down a dark path that forces him to run from authorities and take the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielbergs 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.desc: Larry and Jeff become business partners with actor Ted Danson; an accident at a birthday party results in Larry receiving abnormally large front teeth from his dentist.

programme.desc: When the yam the study group was growing for biology class is killed, Troy and Abed investigate the case.

programme.title: Community

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Pierce and his closest friends are summoned to Hawthorne Labs to play a video game that will determine who inherits his fathers fortune.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: The study group stages an elaborate heist to break into Greendale and free Dean Pelton from the clutches of Chang.

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Abed struggles to stay sane without his best friend, Jeff agrees to represent Shirley in a case against Pierce to determine ownership of their new sandwich shop.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Robert forces the office to throw a welcome party for Nellie. Then, Erin helps Andy practise how he will break up with Jessica.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: After returning from his romantic quest, Andy battles with Nellie for the managers chair; Kelly has a difficult time choosing between Ryan and a perfect man (Sendhil Ramamurthy).

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy crashes a fundraiser and ends up adopting 12 dogs. Dwight learns that an auction winner loses money. Nellie learns how to eat a taco.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy tries to jumpstart his comeback. After Robert drunkenly shuts down a local branch, Jim and Dwight join forces in hope of outsmarting a salesman.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: A former boss helps Andy go under cover and stage a coup. A new opportunity arises for Robert.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Two new, young employees throw Dwight and Jim off balance. Meanwhile, Andy returns from leadership training with a desire for revenge.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: A toast at Roys wedding leads to Pam and Jim searching their relationships for buried secrets. Meanwhile, Dwight reacts to Nellies mandatory charity initiative.

programme.desc: As Andy flaunts a discovery he made about his ancestry, Darryl struggles in his new role. Meanwhile, Dwight teaches a language to Erin, who wants to impress her boyfriends educated family and Jim reveals a secret.

programme.desc: When Jim convinces Dwight the building is unsafe, Dwight rents a bus to use as his office. Then, Nellie asks for Andys help and Jim uses pie to cheer Pam.

programme.desc: Andy invites his old a cappella group to perform for Halloween, which leads to a confrontation with his frenemy. Then, Dwight tries to track down a madman in the office and Jim and Pam fight over his new job.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy must step up when his dad loses all his familys money. Then, when Dwight is a guest on a radio show, his co-workers call in to torture him and Kevin learns a secret about Oscar.

programme.title: Police 24/7

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: A series of action-packed Christmas specials looking at how the police respond to street crime. In Colwyn Bay, a man is fined for urinating on a Christmas tree, and a fight in Leicester city centre ends in one man being arrested. In Peterborough, a drunk man found covered in blood admits to having taken heroin, and a police officer is attacked while attending an incident outside a nightclub.

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: Action-packed series looking at how the police respond to street crime during the festive season. In Colchester, the military police are called in to help with the problem of fighting between civilians and squaddies, and in Barnsley a fight between two women in a pub escalates as other drinkers get involved.

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: Action-packed series which looks at how the police respond to street crime during the festive season. Police pursue and apprehend a speeding car, and find that the driver was being forced by her passenger to help him escape. In St Albans, police detain two teenage boys for aggressive behaviour, and three teenage girls are arrested for attempted robbery.

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: Action-packed series which looks at street crime during the festive season. Police are called to a kebab shop in Harrogate, where a female employee has been attacked by a customer, and in Colchester two women are arrested for possessing cocaine. Despite the introduction of pop-up urinals in the street, a Durham man urinates on the pavement and becomes abusive when police ask him to stop.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: A raid on the house of a suspected dealer leads officers to a drugs den. Two drunk men seriously test PC Aaron Parsleys patience.

programme.title: Highway Cops

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: A motorcyclists world is spun around in Victoria Park Tunnel. Truck drivers are taking ever greater risks and paying the price for them. A wanderer on the motorway tells his story.

programme.title: Motorway Patrol

programme.title: Border Security: Canadas Front Line

programme.desc: Bringing together the most spectacular car crashes, near misses and road incidents ever seen.

programme.title: The Ultimate: Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest and best in programming entertainment.

programme.title: Christmas Carole
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating businesswoman has earned her a fortune, but its made her a worse human being. The truth is that Carole is a monumentally mean person, positively Scrooge-like. And, just like Ebeneezer, needs a Christmas lesson.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: An unfamiliar race, known as the Travelers, hunts down the Atlantis expedition after hearing of the teams notorious ancient techniques used to fight the Wraith.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: A Christmas feast awaits as Romesh, Jamie and Micah celebrate the season as only they can, with special guests over dinner and a spot of golf.

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Miracle on 4th Street: The concept of Miracle on 4th Street, asks a simple question. What would happen if Santa Claus strolled into New York in the lead-up to Christmas?

programme.title: Christmas at the Movies
programme.desc: Christmas time just would not be Christmas without movies, and Tom Hanks and a cast of other familiar faces are here to reveal their favourite festive flicks and seasonal specials.

programme.title: Caught On Dashcam: Christmas Special
programme.desc: Bringing together the most spectacular car crashes, near misses and road incidents ever seen.

programme.title: Mittens And Pants Christmas Special
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve in Kibble Corner, but a present mix-up is causing lots of trouble! Will Mittens and Pants learn that the true meaning of Christmas may not be about presents after all?

programme.title: Arctic From Above
programme.desc: Join Liz Bonnin as she comes face-to-face with caribou, abseils down a cliff to study gyrfalcons and helps catch seals in Svalbard.

programme.title: Christmas at the Movies
programme.desc: Christmas time just would not be Christmas without movies, and Tom Hanks and a cast of other familiar faces are here to reveal their favourite festive flicks and seasonal specials.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After fighting with Lisa, Bart runs away from home to teach the family a lesson.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Four wittily woven tales that, like egg nog with lashings of brandy, are sweet and sharp in equal measure. Pop princess Katy Perry guest stars.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Krusty and his daughter spend an eventful Christmas with the Simpsons. Reverend Lovejoy tries to add to his congregation.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home.

programme.title: Christmas Carole
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating businesswoman has earned her a fortune, but its made her a worse human being. The truth is that Carole is a monumentally mean person, positively Scrooge-like. And, just like Ebeneezer, needs a Christmas lesson.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating boy meets two Santas in the woods, one of whom claims to have fallen from his sleigh, but he is more interested in the other man when he learns he is on the run for robbing a bank.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...
programme.desc: Rob and Rom venture into the Sumatran jungle to see who can snap the most exhibition-worthy photo for Wildlife Photographer of the Year.

programme.title: Micky Flanagan: If Ever We Needed It
programme.desc: ...If Ever. Live at the London Palladium, Cockney comic Micky Flanagan is back for a blokey hour of old school jokes about energy bills, retro telly and marital disputes.

programme.title: Never Mind the Buzzcocks
programme.desc: Sophie Willan, Matt Goss, Jessie J and Guz Khan join the regulars for the 2025 Christmas special of the shows revival, hosted by Greg Davies.

programme.title: David Blaine: Real or Magic
programme.desc: Following David Blaines signature brand of street magic as he mystifies some of the most recognisable celebrities in the world, including Jamie Foxx, Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Ricky Gervais, Katy Perry, Lenny Kravitz and Will Smith.

programme.title: David Blaine: Beyond Magic
programme.desc: The magician astonishes celebrities with his signature brand of street magic; celebrities include David Beckham, Johnny Depp, Drake, Steph Curry, Dave Chappelle, John Travolta, Patrick Stewart, Emma Stone, Arnold Schwarzenegger and more.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...
programme.desc: The votes are in for 2022s Christmas challenge and Rob and Romesh are ready. Their task - to get their skates on with Mickey and co in Disney on Ice.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: A Christmas feast awaits as Romesh, Jamie and Micah celebrate the season as only they can, with special guests over dinner and a spot of golf.

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Miracle on 4th Street: The concept of Miracle on 4th Street, asks a simple question. What would happen if Santa Claus strolled into New York in the lead-up to Christmas?

programme.title: Christmas at the Movies
programme.desc: Christmas time just would not be Christmas without movies, and Tom Hanks and a cast of other familiar faces are here to reveal their favourite festive flicks and seasonal specials.

programme.title: Caught On Dashcam: Christmas Special
programme.desc: Bringing together the most spectacular car crashes, near misses and road incidents ever seen.

programme.title: Mittens And Pants Christmas Special
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve in Kibble Corner, but a present mix-up is causing lots of trouble! Will Mittens and Pants learn that the true meaning of Christmas may not be about presents after all?

programme.title: Arctic From Above
programme.desc: Join Liz Bonnin as she comes face-to-face with caribou, abseils down a cliff to study gyrfalcons and helps catch seals in Svalbard.

programme.title: Christmas at the Movies
programme.desc: Christmas time just would not be Christmas without movies, and Tom Hanks and a cast of other familiar faces are here to reveal their favourite festive flicks and seasonal specials.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After fighting with Lisa, Bart runs away from home to teach the family a lesson.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Four wittily woven tales that, like egg nog with lashings of brandy, are sweet and sharp in equal measure. Pop princess Katy Perry guest stars.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Krusty and his daughter spend an eventful Christmas with the Simpsons. Reverend Lovejoy tries to add to his congregation.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home.

programme.title: Christmas Carole
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating businesswoman has earned her a fortune, but its made her a worse human being. The truth is that Carole is a monumentally mean person, positively Scrooge-like. And, just like Ebeneezer, needs a Christmas lesson.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating boy meets two Santas in the woods, one of whom claims to have fallen from his sleigh, but he is more interested in the other man when he learns he is on the run for robbing a bank.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...
programme.desc: Rob and Rom venture into the Sumatran jungle to see who can snap the most exhibition-worthy photo for Wildlife Photographer of the Year.

programme.title: Micky Flanagan: If Ever We Needed It
programme.desc: ...If Ever. Live at the London Palladium, Cockney comic Micky Flanagan is back for a blokey hour of old school jokes about energy bills, retro telly and marital disputes.

programme.title: Never Mind the Buzzcocks
programme.desc: Sophie Willan, Matt Goss, Jessie J and Guz Khan join the regulars for the 2025 Christmas special of the shows revival, hosted by Greg Davies.

programme.title: David Blaine: Real or Magic
programme.desc: Following David Blaines signature brand of street magic as he mystifies some of the most recognisable celebrities in the world, including Jamie Foxx, Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Ricky Gervais, Katy Perry, Lenny Kravitz and Will Smith.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Its Christmas, so when a Santa needs reviving after a strenuous day, what else would anyone do but give the man a strong drink? programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Its Christmas at Button House and Mike and Alison are heading to Mikes parents to celebrate with family. As Mike piles up the Tupperware with what he insists are only side dishes, despite one clearly being an entire turkey, Kitty expresses her disappointment at not spending Christmas day with Alison. programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.sub-title: How to Build a London Cab
programme.desc: The classic black cab goes green, as we see how a 21st-century electric London taxi is made, from the aluminium chassis to the all-electric £60,000 eco-cab.

programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.sub-title: How to Build the Fastest Car
programme.desc: A team of plucky Brits attempt to prove that theyve built the worlds fastest car.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Sunderland to pick up a real Italian beauty - a 1972 Lancia Fulvia Zagato. Red and racy, the car has seen better days, but Dereks still impressed.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Up for sale at the Mathewsons auction is a 1275 Mini GT thats come from just down the road and could be a future British icon.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Despite having the largest pre-war European army, Frances outdated forces were humiliated by the Germans. Identifying a weakness in the Maginot Line, a defensive border which ran along the north east of France but did not extend to the channel in the west, German air and armour power simply skirted the line in the north and forged south.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: With France fallen, the USA as yet uninvolved and the Russian pact with Hitler still in force, Britain stands all alone against the Germans forces across the English Channel.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts gather in a packed Cheltenham Town Hall as visitors arrive for another busy day of evaluations. Objects on show include a curious table from the nearby racecourse, complete with carved horse hooves for legs, some fascinating examples of espionage microdots used by the Norwegian Resistance in World War Two, and a group of bargain boot buys turn up trumps for the owner.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts make a return visit to Cheltenham Town Hall. Featured family treasures include a valuable silver fruit bowl damaged when thrown in a domestic tiff, relics of Captain Scotts last expedition to the South Pole and a humble house brick with an important story.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Anglophile Derek struggles to get his message across on a rare trip abroad to pick up a Bentley, while a well-restored Ford XR2 sets the auction alight.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave finds a very rare 70s Sunbeam Lotus that has been rotting away in a farmyard for 29 years, while a Morris Minor convertible goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: This edition is all about Earths final frontier - caves. Deer Cave in Borneo is a daytime retreat for five million bats, and their droppings support an entire community of creatures. Troglodytes like the Texas cave salamander and Thailands cave angel have neither eyes nor pigment, and the entire populations of both are found in just a couple of caves.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A look at mountains, beginning with the birth of a mountain at one of the lowest places on Earth, and ending at the summit of Everest. Experience the full force of an avalanche in the Rockies, where grizzlies survive the harsh winters deep inside the dangerous slopes, and fly alongside demoiselle cranes as they attempt to cross the Himalayas.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: A tailor arrives to measure up Captain Geering and Colonel von Strohm, and an explosive bottle of gin is doing the rounds and arrives in the cafe. Edith gives it to her mother - for medicinal purposes.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Rene is captured by German troops while on a sabotage mission and imprisoned by General von Klinkerhoffen, who orders General von Strohm to make his punishment severe.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Following his supposed execution, Rene finds himself having to arrange his own funeral in order to satisfy Herr Flick, who hopes to use the occasion for a spot of Resistance-spotting.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will Trickett and Gus Gregory hunt for neglected cars they can fix and flip for a profit. Any losses incurred by their flipping come out of their own pockets.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Sunderland to pick up a real Italian beauty - a 1972 Lancia Fulvia Zagato. Red and racy, the car has seen better days, but Dereks still impressed.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: As a teenager, all Dave wanted for his first car was a 2 litre Ghia Cortina, and today hes off to Nottinghamshire to collect just that, alongside a Mark 1 Capri.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and daughter Kate collect a Series 1 Land Rover, while Jack collects an unusual wartime paratroopers bike in Scarborough.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.desc: An access-all-areas look at how the classic Mini is being manufactured for the electric revolution. With unrestricted access to the Mini factory in Oxford, we see the engineering required to create every component that goes into a Mini Electric.

programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.desc: The historic Jaguar factory in the Midlands opens its doors to show us exactly how the new F-TYPE is built from scratch. From its sleek chassis to an engine that can reach top speeds of 177mph, we follow one F-TYPE on its journey through the factory.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to North Yorkshire to pick up a veteran London-to-Brighton car, theres an emotional farewell to a 1980s Bedford HA van, and a Toyota Corona finds a new home.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek gives the once-over to a Royale Formula Ford race car, and Paul is on a marathon trip to Teesside to pick up a 1953 MGYB, a Moggy Van and an 80s Yamaha 250RD motorbike.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Hitler turns his tanks towards Russia. After a succession of devastating victories, the Germans delay fatally, and the fierce Russian winter takes a grip.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: The Japanese, at war on the Chinese mainland since 1931, hope for quick victories over the British and the Dutch, but 7 December 1941 brings the infamous attack on Pearl Harbor, and the start of an all-conquering sweep through Southeast Asia culminating in the taking of Singapore.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The antiques programme pays a return visit to Castle Coole near Enniskillen in Northern Ireland. Fiona Bruce and the team of experts welcome visitors as they bring their family treasures for inspection. Pieces featured include a poignant reminder from the battlefields of World War One, a beautiful and valuable modern painting of an Irish landscape, and a collection of compacts with a jaw-dropping valuation.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts return to the exciting backdrop of the Farnborough wind tunnels for another busy day of evaluations. There is a diverse collection of objects brought before the cameras, including a mammoths tooth dug up in a garden and the Monopoly board game used by the Great Train Robbers whilst in hiding.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A delightful collection of British classics comes up for auction, including an Austin A35 and a Hillman Avenger Estate in stunning condition. An E-Type Jaguar also hits the auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Three MGs from the 70s turn up at the garage, still covered in original factory wax. Nobody can believe it, or value them. A Morris 1000 turns up at the auction along with a TR7 V8.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: This edition looks at deserts, which cover a third of the Earths land surface. From space they appear lifeless but a closer look reveals a different picture, from Mongolias Gobi desert where wild Bactrian camels have to eat snow in lieu of water, to the Atacama in Chile where guanacos survive by licking the dew off cactus spines.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although the frozen worlds of the Arctic and Antarctic experience the greatest seasonal extremes, it is the advance and retreat of the ice that is the real challenge to life. As the sea freezes, Antarctica doubles in size and all animals except for the Emperor Penguin flee. In the Arctic, the polar bears ice world literally melts beneath its feet, forcing it to swim vast distances.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Colonel Von Strohm and Captain Geering are first kidnapped by the Communist Resistance, then rescued by a Gaullist group, recovering a valuable painting in the process. But whats so special about this particular Madonna?

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.sub-title: The Dance of the Hitler Youth
programme.desc: The Germans celebrate the burning of the Reichstag, by having the young girls of Nouvion dress as Hitler Youth and perform Bavarian dances.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Edith takes advantage of Renes presumed demise to search for his will, and perhaps a new husband.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring a towering structure in London on the banks of the river Thames, witness to the citys darkest days, and a Wisconsin farmstead that brewed up a storm.

programme.title: Mega Metro
programme.desc: A challenge lies in weight when the time comes to dig two tunnels beneath Sydney Harbour, with an insight into the teams planning process.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Making Dave go weak at the knees is a very rare eighties hot hatch - a Citroen Visa GT Tonic.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is heading to Scotland to collect a special Bentley thats been created by a very talented amateur.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
